    • Method Detail

      • acquireKey

        public String acquireKey(String username,
                         String password)
        Uses an HTTP client to obtain an authentication key from the endpoint.
        Parameters:
        username - The username you'll be obtaining an authkey for.
        password - Password for the given username.
        Returns:
        The authentication key for the endpoint.

      • newPublicTopic

        public String newPublicTopic(String title,
                             String authkey)
        Creates a new public topic.
        Parameters:
        title - The title/name of the new Public Topic
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey()"
        Returns:
        The ID code of the newly created topic (in format "t-[id]")

      • newPrivateTopic

        public String newPrivateTopic(String title,
                              String authkey)
        Creates a new private topic.
        Parameters:
        title - The title/name of the new Private Topic
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey()"
        Returns:
        The ID code of the newly created topic (in format "grp-[id]")

      • updateTopic

        public void updateTopic(String title,
                        String desc,
                        String media,
                        Boolean isPrivate,
                        String TID,
                        String authkey)
        Updates an existing topic.
        Parameters:
        title - The updated title of the topic. If null, title remains unchanged.
        desc - The updated description of the topic. If null, description remains unchanged.
        media - The updated media of the topic. If null, media remains unchanged.
        isPrivate - True if the topic is private. False if public.
        TID - The ID of the topic to be updated.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey."

      • newPublicMessage

        public String newPublicMessage(String title,
                               String desc,
                               String mediaID,
                               String topicID,
                               String authkey)
        Posts a new message to a specific public topic.
        Parameters:
        title - The title/name of the message.
        desc - The description of the message.
        mediaID - The media (in format "m-[id]") of the message. See "newMediaFromLocal" or "newMediaFromURL."
        topicID - The ID code of the private topic (in format "t-[id]")
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey."
        Returns:
        The ID code of the newly created message (in format "g-[id]")

      • newPrivateMessage

        public String newPrivateMessage(String title,
                                String desc,
                                String mediaID,
                                String topicID,
                                String authkey)
        Posts a new message to a specific private topic.
        Parameters:
        title - The title/name of the message.
        desc - The description of the message.
        mediaID - The media (in format "m-[id]")of the message. See "newMediaFromLocal" or "newMediaFromURL."
        topicID - The ID code of the private topic (in format "grp-[id]")
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey."
        Returns:
        The ID code of the newly created message (in format "g-[id]")

      • updateMessage

        public void updateMessage(String mess,
                          String desc,
                          String mediaID,
                          String GID,
                          String authkey)
        Updates an existing message.
        Parameters:
        mess - The content/title of the message. If null, message remains unchanged.
        desc - The description of the message. If null, description remains unchanged.
        mediaID - The media (in format "m-[id]") of the message. If null, media remains unchanged.
        GID - The message ID (in format "g-[id]").
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"

      • getMessageJSON

        public String getMessageJSON(String GID,
                             boolean isPrivate,
                             String authkey)
        Returns the contents of a given message in JSON format.
        Parameters:
        GID - The ID of the message (in format "g-[id]")
        isPrivate - True if the given message is private. False if public.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"
        Returns:
        The JSON string of a given message.

      • getMessageMedia

        public String getMessageMedia(String GID,
                              boolean isPrivate,
                              String authkey)
        Obtains the media ID from a given message.
        Parameters:
        GID - The ID of the message (in format "g-[id]")
        isPrivate - True if the message is private. False if public.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"
        Returns:
        The media ID (in format "m-[id]") from the supplied message ID.

        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"

        PID - The private topic to invite the user to (in format "grp-[id]")

                                 String GID,
                                 String authkey)
        Adds attributes (keys and corresponding values) to a message.
        Parameters:
        attributes - The attributes to add. A map of the attributes and their values.
        GID - The message ID (in format "g-[id]") to add attributes to.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"

      • getAttributes

        public Map<String,String> getAttributes(String GID,
                                        Boolean isPrivate,
                                        String authkey)
        Retrieves a list of keys and corresponding values posted to a given message.
        Parameters:
        GID - The message ID (in format "g-[id]") to retrieve attributes from.
        isPrivate - True if the message is private. False if public.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"
        Returns:
        A Map containing the keys and corresponding values posted to a message.

                               String gameID,

        Parameters:

        gameID - The message ID (in format "g-[id]") to add an option to.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        name - User's actual name.
        username - User's desired username.
        email - User's email.
        password - User's desired password.
        Returns:
        The ID of the new user (in format "u-[id]").

      • verifyEmail

        public String verifyEmail(String email)
        Verifies that the email belongs to a valid user at the endpoint.
        Parameters:
        email - The email to verify.
        Returns:
        The ID of the user (in format "u-[id]"), or the empty string ("") if the user doesn't exist.

      • verifyUsername

        public String verifyUsername(String user)
        Verifies that the username belongs to a valid user at the endpoint.
        Parameters:
        user - The username to verify.
        Returns:
        The ID of the user (in format "u-[id]"), or the empty string ("") if the user doesn't exist.

        Gets the username associated with a valid user at the endpoint.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID to retrieve the username for.
        Returns:
        The ID of the user (in format "u-[id]"), or the empty string ("") if the user doesn't exist.

        Parameters:
        userID - The user ID (in format "u-[id]") to retrieve private topics from.
        Returns:

        Returns:
        A list of all of the user's public topics and their associated IDs (in format "t-[id]")

        Parameters:
        TID - The private topic ID (in format "grp-[id]") to obtain messages from.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"
        Returns:
        A map of the topic's private messages to their corresponding message IDs.

        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"
        Returns:
        A map of the topic's private messages to their corresponding message IDs.

        Returns:

      • getOptionsIDMap

        public Map<String,String> getOptionsIDMap(String GID,
                                          Boolean isPrivate,
                                          String authkey)
        Retrives options and their IDs from a given message.
        Parameters:
        GID - The ID of the message to retrieve options from.
        isPrivate - True if the message is private. False if public.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey."
        Returns:
        A map of options to their IDs for a given message.

      • getOptionsAnswerMap

        public Map<String,String> getOptionsAnswerMap(String GID,
                                              Boolean isPrivate,
                                              String authkey)
        Retrives options and their answer counts from a given message.
        Parameters:
        GID - The ID of the message to retrieve options from.
        isPrivate - True if the message is private. False if public.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey."
        Returns:
        A map of options to the number of responders.

      • deleteTopic

        public void deleteTopic(String id,
                        Boolean isPrivate,
                        String authkey)
        Deletes a topic.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the topic to delete.
        isPrivate - True if the topic is private. False if public.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(String id,
                       String authkey)
        Deletes a user.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user to delete (in format "u-[id]" )
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey." The authentication key must be obtained using the user-to-be-deleted's credentials.

      • deleteMessage

        public void deleteMessage(String GID,
                          String authkey)
        Deletes a message.
        Parameters:
        GID - The ID of the message to delete (in format "g-[id]" )
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey."

      • newMediaFromLocal

        public String newMediaFromLocal(java.io.File f,
                                String authkey)
        Uploads an image from your local directory to a message.
        Parameters:
        f - The file to upload from your local directory
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey."
        Returns:
        The media ID of the uploaded image.

      • newMediaFromURL

        public String newMediaFromURL(String URL,
                              String authkey)
        Uploads an image from an online URL.
        Parameters:
        URL - The url location of the image.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey."
        Returns:
        The media ID of the uploaded image.

      • deleteSubscription

        public void deleteSubscription(String subID,
                               String authkey)
        Deletes a subscription.
        Parameters:
        subID - The ID of the subscription to delete (in format "sub-[id]" )
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"

      • newMessageFromTemplate

        public String newMessageFromTemplate(String name,
                                     Boolean sameName,
                                     String fromGID,
                                     String toTID,
                                     boolean isPrivate,
                                     String authkey)
        Creates a new message using another message as a template.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new message. Ignored if sameName is true.
        sameName - True if message name will be the same as the template message.
        fromGID - The template message ID
        toTID - The topic to post the message to.
        isPrivate - True if private, false if public.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey"
        Returns:
        The new message ID

      • newTopicFromTemplate

        public String newTopicFromTemplate(String name,
                                   Boolean sameName,
                                   String fromTID,
                                   boolean isPrivate,
                                   String authkey)
        Copies all of the messages (including their attributes and options) from a template topic and posts them to another topic.
        Parameters:
        name - The new topic's name. Ignored if sameName is true.
        sameName - True if the new topic will have the same name as the template
        fromTID - The template topic's ID.
        isPrivate - True if the template topic is private. False if public.
        authkey - The authentication key. See "acquireKey."
        Returns:
        The new topic ID
